attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To Challange the Prime Minister and Mr Darling to save the pub industry as they have put more and more pressure on the pub industry with the amount of taxes they have put on alcohol and in doing so are killing the industry and thousand upon thousands of people will become unempoloyed and pubs will cease to exist and there will not be a pub left where we can all go and relax, to take our families to meet friends, to watch sports
